name: Tank Classic:Super Battle City
description:
We all remember that classic tank game in the 90s. Hundreds of levels, simple and addictive. The sweet memory is not become reality with the Supper Classic Tank Game that available right on your smart phone. Yes, it is the native game and you don’t need the NES simulator to run.

◆ Game Features:
* Classic game play
* Many levels
* Many tanks
* Original graphic and sound


◆ How to play tank 90s:
* You need to win the battle to protect the city
* Control the classic tank and raid the enemy tanks
* Don’t get killed. Yes! Classic!
* A level will be completed after player destroys all enemy tanks.
* Move to next level

Get ready for a fierce tank battle!

Be super! Be classic! Be transplant!
